description: The Arete Mid Waterproof delivers all the performance of the low, but with added ankle support. Backpacker Magazine named this shoe the Most Protective, thanks to its ankle height and protective forefoot plate that defends your feet on rocky trails. Its A3 Chassis provides dynamic performance in a lightweight shoe that is ready for the long haul.
name: Oboz Arete Mid B-Dry - Mens

specs.value: Waterproof treated Woven upper + Welded TPU Film Overlays, B-DRY Waterproof Membrane, Molded rubber toe cap
Single Density Compression Molded EVA, ESS Forefoot, A3 TPU Chassis
